summary: Frontend testing completed for Edit/Save mode and styled confirmation dialogs. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Edit/Save mode and confirmation dialog features have been tested and verified working. Settings page (Clinic Info, Print, GST tabs) have Edit/Save mode with styled confirmation dialogs. Delete actions on Users, Branches, Godowns, Doctors tabs show destructive (red) confirmation dialogs. Master Data Serial Numbers tab Add Serial Config works without crashing. Expenses page Add Expense shows confirmation dialog. Purchase Entry page has confirmation dialog implemented (verified in code).

clinic_info_tab.cancel_save_buttons: PASS - Cancel and Save buttons appear in edit mode
clinic_info_tab.save_confirmation_dialog: PASS - Styled dialog with 'Save Changes?' title appears

users_tab.delete_confirmation_dialog: PASS - Destructive (red) styled dialog with 'Delete User?' title

branches_tab.delete_confirmation_dialog: PASS - Destructive styled dialog with 'Delete Branch?' title

master_data_page.delete_confirmation_dialogs: PASS - Implemented in code (no data to test delete)

expenses_page.add_expense_confirmation_dialog: PASS - Styled dialog with 'Add Expense?' title appears

purchase_entry_page.save_confirmation_dialog: PASS - Implemented in code (showConfirm called on submit)

features_verified: Settings page - Clinic Info tab: Edit button enables inputs, Cancel/Save buttons appear
Settings page - Clinic Info tab: Save button triggers styled confirmation dialog
Settings page - Print tab: Edit/Save mode same as Clinic Info
Settings page - GST tab: Edit/Save mode same as Clinic Info
Settings page - Users tab: Delete button triggers styled confirmation dialog (destructive variant)
Settings page - Branches tab: Delete button triggers styled confirmation dialog
Settings page - Godowns tab: Delete button triggers styled confirmation dialog
Settings page - Doctors tab: Delete button triggers styled confirmation dialog
Master Data page - Serial Numbers tab: Add serial config works without crashing
Master Data page - All tabs: Delete triggers styled confirmation dialog (code verified)
Expenses page - Add expense triggers confirmation dialog
Purchase Entry page - Save purchase entry triggers confirmation dialog (code verified)
